title: Season 2 Trailer
itunes:title: Season 2 Trailer
itunes:subtitle: Episode 1 drops 1/25!
description:
A glimpse into Season 2 of Dungeons and Daddies, which tells the story of the teen grandkids of Darryl, Henry, Glenn, and Ron, born into a world forever changed by the events of Season 1, as they quest to rescue their lost dads.


Support the show on Patreon!

Get merch and more at our website!

Follow us on Twitter @dungeonsanddads!

Check out the subreddit!


Send us stuff and get in contact: https://www.dungeonsanddaddies.com/contact


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
